pages.text: During the night and in areas with no sunlight, it's nearly impossible to see anything through the darkness. You'll need to come prepared with a $(thing)light source$() if you want to adventure in the dark.$(2br)Holding a $(item)torch$() or other light-emitting item will light up the area around you as you move, allowing you to see in dark places.
$(o)Light level on a full moon vs. normal nights
Only the light from a $(thing)full moon$() is strong enough to illuminate the world at night.$(2br)You never know what predators may be lurking in the shadows.

pages.title: Mining Helmet
pages.text: A $(item)mining helmet$() acts as a wearable source of light. It goes into your $(thing)helmet$() slot like any other armor piece and keeps the area around you lit.
